description: Manage Batch account Network rules in Network Profile.

commands.name: az batch account network-profile network-rule add
commands.summary: Add a Network rule from a Network Profile.
commands.syntax:
az batch account network-profile network-rule add --resource-group
                                                  [--ip-address]
                                                  [--name]
                                                  [--profile {BatchAccount, NodeManagement}]
examples: az batch account network-profile network-rule add -g MyResourceGroup -n MyBatchAccount --profile BatchAccount --ip-address 1.2.3.4

commands.name: az batch account network-profile network-rule delete
commands.summary: Delete a Network rule from a Network Profile.
commands.syntax:
az batch account network-profile network-rule delete --resource-group
                                                     [--ip-address]
                                                     [--name]
                                                     [--profile {BatchAccount, NodeManagement}]
                                                     [--yes]
examples: az batch account network-profile network-rule delete -g MyResourceGroup -n MyBatchAccount --profile BatchAccount --ip-address 1.2.3.4

commands.name: az batch account network-profile network-rule list
commands.summary: List the Network rules from a Network Profile.
commands.syntax:
az batch account network-profile network-rule list --resource-group
                                                   [--name]
examples: az batch account network-profile network-rule list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyBatchAccount
